page.title: 15HEAVY INDUSTRY
page.content: The heavy industries of this region have traditionally been the main employers of labour in Cleveland.The principal companies involved are {B.S.C.,I.C.I. and Smiths Dock.}A new industry in recent years has been the oil refining business on the North bank of the{Tees.}Most of the heavy industry lies along the banks of the river.In recent years the area has witnessed the closure of several works,the most important of which has been the large steel complex at Cargo Fleet.As the works have closed land has been freed for re-development and this is a major feature of the area.It has also meant land has become available to improve road communication to and from the heavy industry complexes.
